name: Into the 90s!
description:
My first demo ever made during Slavic Game Jam 2016 for the topic "90s". The first and the last time I had used GameMaker.

The gameplay lasts 1-2 minutes. It's not explained, but the game ends after the second conversation with professor. Space acts as A button, I opens and closes inventory, you move around using arrow buttons.

"We need to go back to the nineties!" - these are the last words you heard before you went back in time to 1995 - a year, which - this time - you surely won't forget!

Tileset made by Muziak, taken from http://pixeljoint.com/pixelart/71895.htm. Logo made in old school WordArt.
